Uses of Interface
picard.vcf.filter.VariantFilter

Packages that use VariantFilter
picard.vcf.filter   
 

Uses of VariantFilter in picard.vcf.filter
 

Classes in picard.vcf.filter that implement VariantFilter
 class AlleleBalanceFilter
          Filters out a record if the allele balance for heterozygotes is out of a defined range across all samples.
 class FisherStrandFilter
          Filters records based on the phred scaled p-value from the Fisher Strand test stored in the FS attribute.
 class QdFilter
          Filters out sites that have a QD annotation applied to them and where the QD value is lower than a lower limit.
 

Constructor parameters in picard.vcf.filter with type arguments of type VariantFilter
FilterApplyingVariantIterator(java.util.Iterator<htsjdk.variant.variantcontext.VariantContext> iterator, java.util.Collection<VariantFilter> filters, java.util.Collection<GenotypeFilter> gtFilters)
          Constructs an iterator from an underlying iterator and the provided (possibly empty) collections of variant and genotype filters.
